humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic breast carcinoma in one of 14 axillary lymph nodes (specimen E), but the sentinel lymph node (specimen C) is negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the provided rules, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic breast carcinoma in 1 out of 14 axillary lymph nodes (pN1a), as indicated in the 'Pathologic Staging' section of the report. This means that the cancer has spread to the lymph nodes, but the spread is limited.
